1. I've found our Developer (I fucking hope).
2. This thread is lol now.

item.title: [Serious Applicants Only] Omicron Development Team - Team_Rocket's Team
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:142, topic:428649”]When I look at a development team, I put it (in my mind) into one of two categories:

  1. A new team that needs developers to start. With this type of server I look for some basic information, like the base and such. I don’t usually look for any proof of development.
  2. An existing project that needs new developers to continue. I look for proof of existing development as well as the basic information. Asking people to join a pre-existing project that has already been developed on is bad practice, without giving them more information (like pictures or at least lists of what has been done).

Both of these are different than the ‘Server Development’ section, which needs proof to be posted at all, as it’s basically a show off board.

I think if this has such ‘secret’ content, you should use more ‘secret’ methods of recruiting people. As in, look for people yourself, instead of making people apply for a server they know nothing about. In other words, this is server type #2, so you should post some proof of development (proof that you will ‘succeed’) if you want to keep your thread open.[/quote]

Close it up, I’ve got what I need. Infexis of R-S will most likely be our Client Developer.

Read full topic
item.source: [Serious Applicants Only] Omicron Development Team - Team_Rocket's Team

Both of these are different than the ‘Server Development’ section, which needs proof to be posted at all, as it’s basically a show off board.

I think if this has such ‘secret’ content, you should use more ‘secret’ methods of recruiting people. As in, look for people yourself, instead of making people apply for a server they know nothing about. In other words, this is server type #2, so you should post some proof of development (proof that you will ‘succeed’) if you want to keep your thread open.[/quote]

item.title: [Serious Applicants Only] Omicron Development Team - Team_Rocket's Team
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

When I look at a development team, I put it (in my mind) into one of two categories:

  1. A new team that needs developers to start. With this type of server I look for some basic information, like the base and such. I don’t usually look for any proof of development.
  2. An existing project that needs new developers to continue. I look for proof of existing development as well as the basic information. Asking people to join a pre-existing project that has already been developed on is bad practice, without giving them more information (like pictures or at least lists of what has been done).

Both of these are different than the ‘Server Development’ section, which needs proof to be posted at all, as it’s basically a show off board.

I think if this has such ‘secret’ content, you should use more ‘secret’ methods of recruiting people. As in, look for people yourself, instead of making people apply for a server they know nothing about. In other words, this is server type #2, so you should post some proof of development (proof that you will ‘succeed’) if you want to keep your thread open.

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:130, topic:428649”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=531341.msg3889117#msg3889117 date=1326686837]
Where is David when you need him. Thread needs to obviously be locked.
[/quote]According to IRC he will be gone until Tuesday/Wednesday[/quote]

Damn. That would explain it since the other moderators are kinda passive. Any who…

So can we all be in agreement that this guy does not know what he is talking about and leave the thread to the wolves?

Let’s leave it at that.

item.title: [Serious Applicants Only] Omicron Development Team - Team_Rocket's Team
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:128, topic:428649”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=531341.msg3889106#msg3889106 date=1326686611]

Another note:

If you think the ideas will be “stolen,” then you’re obviously retarded. If it’s unique enough and difficult to implement, then it wouldn’t be stolen because nobody would know how to incorporate it into their own server.
[/quote]That sentence has several holes in it. You and I both know there are several capable members of Mopar and R-S combined who can do some pretty impressive content. Some of the ideas that cannot be mentioned at this time could be duplicated it wouldn’t be done over night though. You guys (the haters) are just spamming a thread without the only person who can state a defense even being present. That is just as bad as talking about somebody behind their backs. Discuss this when TR is on.

Okay, but even if you don’t release it now, it will be released sooner or later.

now im gone…[/quote]
I’d assume he’d like to show it off when he has it done and perfected.
You wouldn’t want to show something that is incomplete, would you?

sinisoul:

Where is David when you need him. Thread needs to obviously be locked.

Not really, because the OP isn’t even here and can’t even defend himself.

Read full topic

item.title: [Serious Applicants Only] Omicron Development Team - Team_Rocket's Team

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:120, topic:428649”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=531341.msg3889079#msg3889079 date=1326686181]
So can we all be in agreement that this guy does not know what he is talking about and leave the thread to the wolves?
[/quote]No, I have contacted TR via Skype. When he gets on he will review this. If he chooses to disclose information he will be the person to disclose the information.[/quote]
